title: Blending Chords
description: The second book in the Blind Rebels rock star romance series finds guitarist Callum struggling to balance his career and single parenthood while discovering its OK to make room for romance, but will the woman he gives the last bit of his trust to destroy him forever?Ari is the beautiful, nurturing nanny who appears to be everything Callum needs but it’s only a matter of time before the dark secrets of her past come back with a vengeance and threaten the existence of the entire band. Callum  Guitarist. Rock star. Blind Rebels bandmate. My public persona embodies all of these titles fans have gifted upon me. But none of them matter as much as the role bestowed on me two years ago: father.  My son is my world, yet juggling being a single father with everything else hasn't been easy. I know I need help, but how can I trust a stranger with the one thing my entire world revolves around?   Arista  I must get out of my sister’s house. As much as I love her, I can't tolerate her handsy husband. Armed with a degree in early childhood education, I'm determined to find a live-in nanny position that will allow me to truly make a difference in a child’s life with one-on-one interaction.  Being a nanny for Callum Donogue looked like the opportunity of a lifetime. Unfortunately, he seems to resent me being there, spending time with his son. Can we find a way to make this work? Or will our constant clashing prompt him to hang up his guitar and abandon the Blind Rebels mid-tour?This book contains adult subject matter and is intended for adult audiences. This book is not recommended for audiences who may be sensitive to discussions involving molestation and sexual abuse, kidnapping, or other adult topics.
author: Amy Kaybach
